abstract: The Hub home phone system has some useful features, but it’s not quite the promised great leap.
snippet: The Hub home phone system has some useful features, but it’s not quite the promised great leap.
lead_paragraph: Here’s news you won’t see too often from a wireless carrier: Last week Verizon unveiled a new phone that is not a mobile device. Rather, the Verizon Hub is a home phone system that the company claims is a giant leap forward from traditional landline phones.

headline.main: A Wireless Carrier Offers a Different Inducement to Drop the Landline
headline.print_headline: A Wireless Carrier Offers a Different Inducement to Drop the Landline

abstract: Tax cuts that benefited Verizon were eliminated from the stimulus bill, but more than $6 billion in grants for broadband projects survived.
snippet: Tax cuts that benefited Verizon were eliminated from the stimulus bill, but more than $6 billion in grants for broadband projects survived.
lead_paragraph: It looks like the tax credit for companies that install new broadband service was cut from the latest version of the economic stimulus bill. The bill still would award more than $6 billion in grants to help build high-speed Internet service, mainly in rural areas.

headline.main: Broadband Tax Credit Cut From Stimulus Bill
